latha mangeshkar mahathmiya ‘eek pyar ka nagma he’, ‘ram theri ganga’, ‘eek radha eek mira’, ‘didi thera diwar diwana’ wani janapriya hindi githa gananawak sandaha dayakathwaya labadi atha. 2001 wasaredi ayata indiya rajaya wisin bharatha rathna sammanaya pirinamana ladi.

prakashitha bhara athi kirimedi bharakaruwan wisin pawathwagena ya yuthu 2018 anka 06 darana bhara (sanshodhitha) panatha saha 2019 janawari 28 dinathi anka 2108/10 darana athiwishesha gasat pathraye pala karana lada 2019 bhara (prakashitha bharawalata adala thorathuru) niyogayanta anukulawa prakashitha bharayak athi kirimedi bharakaruwan wisin pahatha dakwa athi thorathuru laba ganima ha pawathwagena yama sidu kala yuthuwe.

nawala, janadhipathi widyalaye widuhalpathiniya athulu ata daneku wagauththarakaruwan karamin, fathima hashina shreshtadhikaranaya hamuwata giye thama diyaniyata muslim balikawanta himi ayithiyak raka ganimataya.enam pasal nila anduma wenuwata salwaraya ha hijabaya palanda pasal yamata thibena ayithiya thahawuru kara ganimataya.e් 2014 wasaredi ya.2014 dina pawarana lada mema mulika ayithiwasikam pethsamkara, mawa ha diyaniya wenuwen idiripath kale janadhipathi nithignya fasisar musthapa pa්ramukha nithignyayin pirisaki.rajagiriya ...

ee wagema mita passe wartha hadanawita mamath benthara gangen eha ipadunu ayaku bawa mathaka thiya ganna.dakunu palath maha amathi shan wijayalal da silwa, amathiwarun wana dalas alahapperuma, mahinda yapa abewardhana, dosthara rajitha senarathna, piyasena gamage, niyojya amathiwarun wana lakshman yapa abewardhana, mahinda amarawira, parlimenthuª manthriwarun wana namal rajapaksha, nirupama rajapaksha, sanath jayasuriya, wi. ke. indika, sajin was gunawardhana mahathma mahathmihu athulu pirisakda me awasthawata ekwuha..
eelangata wadagath karuna nam widu saha ohuge mawa pradeshiya deshapalanagnyayata dakwana prathirodhaya yi.
aan halapayiyata athithe mathak wela..
thaththa saha kampas ganu lamaya athara wena dewal aya danagena inne.
naththan oya tharam uddachcha nowi innawa.
( ese podi ho danuwath wimakin iwath wuye bopage sahodaraya pamani.)
lestar witharayi ohu thoragaththe.

kanthawa, aya samajaya samanga gatena aakaraya saha aya athwindin wiwidha manasika thathwa aadi wu pu`pal kathikawathak osse kanthawage pragamanaya sandaha madhya parisaraya balapana aakaraya pilibandawa sakachcha kirima mema lipiye aramunayi.

chodanawanta waradakaru wana bhikshuwak karaka sangha sabhawa niyama karana pera sandahan kala danduwam pilipadima prathikshepa karanne nam panatha yatatheda ema bhikshuwa waradakaru kara mahesthrathwarayaku hamuwata pamunuwa rupiyal panas dahasakata noadu dadayak ho masa hayakata nowadi sira danduwamak ho ema danduwam dekama ho labadiya hakiya.
eheth, aththatama naththe hewath thora wanne padarthaya pamanak nowa awakashaya ha kalayada nopawathi.
onna eka sarayak
ek warama aachchige sohona desin ‘‘budu ammo” kiya ka gasana handak asuni.
jathika nidahas peramuna mewara mahamathiwaranayedi rajayata udaw kirimata idiripath wuye, jathika layisthuwen manthri dhura dekak laba dena bawata kala giwisuma nisaya.
oone kenekta hamadama sarthaka wenna bane.
thiras aadharakaya depasa ihatha sighra pracharana krama dekehima sidukala aakarayata kanu dekak kapa eewa kohubath, goma saha mathupita pas yoda purawa hondin mishrakara gatha yuthuya.
apata nam henama sathutuyi oba gana liyawunu lipiya dakala.
ane ban malliye mama me karant waddaganna haduwa neweyi..
***namuth yamak sandaha kerena illimaka nam samanyayen yedenne atha yana artha swarupayayi.
buduradun pindapathaye wadi awasthawaka sudowun maharaju munagasunu awasthawe athi wu debasa thulin gamya wanne buduwarunge gaman magehi pindapathaya sirithak bawayi.
